00034 class SURFIT_EXPORT operD1 : public oper {
00035 public:
00036 
00039         operD1() {};
00040 
00050         operD1(int iN, int iNN, 
00051                REAL ihx, REAL ihy,
00052                bitvec * imask_solved,
00053                bitvec * imask_undefined,
00054                grid_line * ifault);
00055 
00057         virtual ~operD1();
00058 
00059         REAL operator()(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00060         REAL at(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00061         REAL mult_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;

00063                 
00064         virtual long cols() const;
00065         virtual long rows() const;
00066

00068 
00069 protected:
00070

00077

00087

00100 
00102         REAL operator_serve(int i, int j, bool first_x, bool second_x, bool first_y, bool second_y, int * next_j) const;
00103 
00104 };
